citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Mammal Laboratory (NMML)
citeinfo.title: Arctic Aerial Survey (The Database Contains Aerial Survey Data of Offshore Distribution and Behavior of Various Mammals)

descript.abstract: The data base contains aerial survey data of offshore distribution and behavior of bowhead and beluga whales, walrus, and ice seals along Alaska's North Slope from Nome to Barrow, in Spring and Fall, from March 1975 through November 1978. This data includes one vessel cruise for bowheads on the "Polar Sea" through the central Bering sea from March through April 1979. All surveys through ice and some open water.
descript.purpose: Do a survey and obtain data of offshore distribution and behavior of bowhead and beluga whales, walrus, and ice seals along Alaska's North Slope from Nome to Barrow, in Spring and Fall, from March 1975 through November 1978.

idinfo.accconst: This data base is stored on tape and is not active on the computer system.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: This data base is stored on tape and is not active on the computer system.
